column4: Can someone give me a hand. I am getting very low sound levels from jaunty. Fresh install. its like they are at 60% but they are cranked. Using a HDA-intel integrated sound. Checked PCM, its also cranked
It might be viewing the hardware as multiple devices. Have you checked?
Yes. If you're in jaunty, it lists the device at the top
Well, in the sound mixer just go through them, checking the volume levels
